original_text: But the Jews that were at Shushan assembled together on the thirteenth day thereof, and on the fourteenth thereof; and on the fifteenth day of the same they rested, and made it a day of feasting and gladness.
korean_text: 수산에 사는 유다인들은 십삼일과 십사일에 모였고 십오일에 쉬며 이 날에 잔치를 베풀어 즐긴지라

sentences.original_text: But the Jews that were at Shushan
assembled together on the thirteenth day thereof
sentences.korean_translation: 그 달 열셋째 날에 함께 모였고

sentences.original_text: and on the fifteenth day of the same
and made it a day of feasting and gladness
